fields.name: 1. Respect
fields.value: Treat everyone with respect. No harassment, hate speech, or discrimination.

fields.name: 2. No Spam
fields.value: Avoid spamming messages, links, or advertisements.

fields.name: 3. Stay on Topic
fields.value: Use the appropriate channels for your discussions.

fields.name: 4. No NSFW
fields.value: Keep all content safe for work.
